description:
Embark on an adorable adventure, discover new friends and uncover everything the island has to offer. Climb,
Swim, Glide and slide your way into the hearts of the many different characters you meet on your travels!

v1.0.0.description: Initial release of the apworld for Lil Gator Game for use with the [GatorRando plugin](https://github.com/natronium/GatorRando/releases). Follow the instructions in the [README](https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/blob/main/README.md) to generate games using this apworld.
v1.0.0.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld 1.0.0

v1.0.1.description:
Updates to apworld in response to bugs observed during user setup and playtesting, and give guidance on how players can improve their experience using the Freeplay option

## What's Changed
* Python 3.8 compatibility by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/17
* Pair craft sword/shield with item to get craft stuff by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/16
* Update yaml, yaml instructions by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/18


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1
v1.0.1.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld 1.0.1

v1.0.2r2.description:
Update the apworld to allow starting with Megaphone and Texting With Jill!

## What's Changed
* Add Megaphone and Texting With Jill (Checkfinders) with option to start with them in inventory
* Logic fixes

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2
v1.0.2r2.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld 1.0.2

v1.0.6r2.description:
This release features an overhaul of the rules system used to the Rule Builder developed by DrTChops and PR'd to core Archipelago (https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/5048). This release is not backwards compatible with older version of the mod or previously generated multiworlds. This release does generate on both Archipelago 0.6.1 and RC3 for Archipelago 0.6.2, though many of the Universal Tracker features are only available on 0.6.2.

This release includes:
- Conversion to rule builder (bundled in the apworld to allow portability)
- Add options for locking pots, chests, races behind items
- Add [Universal Tracker](https://github.com/FarisTheAncient/Archipelago/releases) compatibility features including a map tracker (like Poptracker) that uses the apworld's logic, player location tracking (on AP 0.6.2 only), yaml-less tracking, and showing locations that are out-of-logic on your settings but are available with tricks.

On AP 0.6.2, hovering over locations on the map in Universal Tracker will show a tooltip listing the locations available in that square. On AP 0.6.1, this feature is not available.

**NOTE**: This apworld is much bigger (5.3 MB) than prior releases. This result is intentional, and comes from including the map directly in the apworld to enable the Universal Tracker mapping.

## What's Changed
* Convert apworld over to using rule builder by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/25


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.6
v1.0.6r2.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld 1.0.6

v1.0.7.description:
Fix Tanner's logic (Tanner's quest does not require you to break his pots, only the mimics, and so does not require the correct pot item)

## What's Changed
* Update Lil Gator Game.yaml with new location locking options by @natronium in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/26
* Tanner rule fix by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/27


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/compare/v1.0.6...v1.0.7
v1.0.7.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld 1.0.7

v1.1.1.description:
A bunch of logic fixes, go see the mod patch notes for the exciting stuff!

## Logic fixes
- Fixed goal logic to 1) include bracelet for use in the Flashback sequence and 2) include the need to access Mountain to do Avery's quest. This fix was accomplished by replacing the "Can Complete Avery" logic here with a CanReachLocation Avery All NPCs in the goal logic.
- Moved goal logic from entrance to "Playground" region to specifically the Victory location. This change is to facilitate the ability to make alternate goals in the future.
- Changed Andromeda logic to include a glider when on "Harder Ranged Quests" option, updating Avery All NPCs as well.
- Removed shield jump as an option to reach one pot ("Tutorial Island - Pot (B1) west of rope to tallest peaks on Tutorial Island") on a peak on Tutorial Island. I have no idea what the clever route was before, and I don't want anyone else to suffer trying to find it.
- Added Bracelet as a requirement for Mochi and a pot near Mochi ("Northeast (Canyon) - Pot (D8) on peak northwest of Jada's pump") because while they might be accessible without it, the route is finicky at best.
- Fixed Tanner's logic, since you don't have to break their pots.

## What's Changed
* Logic Fixes by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/28


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/compare/v1.0.7...v1.1.1
v1.1.1.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld v1.1.1

v1.2.0.description:
Some minor logic fixes, comply with new AP unittests, and add an option to make Awkward Cardboard Destroyers Progression, in case you want to have to logically destroy all the breakables with balloon, bubble gum, or sticky hand.

The more important changes are over in the mod.

No more template yamls provided, now that AP ships with a local yaml creator! Check it out in your AP Launcher!

## What's Changed
* add option to make awkward cardboard destroyers considered by logic by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/34
* fix minor logic errors around verticality by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/35
* comply with unittests and improve typing by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/36
* change origin region to use enum by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/37
* Corrected tracker function name by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/38
* Bump version and change version checking to use manifest by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/40
* Add awkward progression to slot data by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/pull/41


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/natronium/GatorArchipelago/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0
v1.2.0.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld 1.2.0

v1.2.1.description: Bugfix: Update the version check for UT. Back compatible with games generated on 1.2.0, and no changes to the mod.
v1.2.1.title: Lil Gator Game APWorld 1.2.1
